reviews.review: This game has come a very long way and i would recommend it to any person wanting to play a first person shooter that will teach them how to be strategic well as teach them different recoils of different guns giving each person a chance. I would highly recommend this game for online fanatics.
Best game 10/10 would spend $1000 dollars again

It's CS:GO what can I say, it's decently balanced, have had next to no cheater encounters, can put hours into this game and it's overall fun, specially with friends. Although getting old it still holds it's ground against bigger fish.
its a good game if ur into fps shooter games

COUNTER-STRIKE: GLOBAL OFFENSIVE ist ein gutes Spiel das sehr viel spaß macht. Mann sollte es aber mit 4 weiteren freunden spielen da es sonst Verständigungsprobleme mit den anderen Mitspielern geben kann.

Artık Oyunda Hile olduğunu bilmeyen kalmadı! 20 milyona yakın oyuncunun yarısından fazlasının hack olduğu ve VAC ban yeseler dahi smurf hesap açıp global a kasmaya devam eden kişilerle dolu bir oyun, bazıları ise asla VAC BAN yemiyor neden ? çünkü 24 saat de bir,Kişiye atılan reportlar siliniyor ve hile kullananlar bundan fazlasıyla yararlanıyor MM (rekabetçi) bıraktık rütbe kasmayı bıraktık zaten nasıl oynadığımız belli, topluluk sunucularına girip eğleniyim desen daha kötü, adama hilesin diyosun adam, ağla falan filan konuşuyor rahat rahat son gelen VAC ban Dalgasıyla 1 günde 60 bin kişi vac yedi, 50 bin tane yeni hesap açılmıştır bile,Yani bu oyunda kimin hilesi daha iyiyse o kazanır .
El mejor juego FPS de steam
good game to trigger my boyfriend
It is a great game overall if you are looking for a competitive game

I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death. A passionate belief in your business and personal objectives can make all the difference between success and failure. If you aren't proud of what you're doing, why should anybody else be?
